name: Candy Catch
description:
[For the Ludum Dare 41 solo]

A game for kids!
Collect as much candies as you can.

Made with :
- Game engine : Unity 2017.
- 3D Modeling & animation : 3DS Max.
- 3D Texturing : Substance Painter.
- Image Editing : Photoshop.
- Sound & Music : Ableton Live (Audacity to convert to OGG).
